The accusations of sexual assault and his four game suspension a distant memory. He sat those games out. The Steelers survived those four games. And then he came back and it appears nobody remembers what he did, Stephen Mosher said. Memories of Michael Vick 's dog fighting conviction and jail time may be harder to shake, but the athlete was easily able to resume his lucrative NFL career after making a few amends.

, well-known egyptologist Zahi Hawass , on Thursday played down accounts of the break-in at the Museum and warned against`` rumours.'' In a posting on his blog, Zahi Hawass said the incident at the museum resulted in 70 broken objects, all of which can be restored. `` I want people to know that after nine days of protests, the monuments are safe,'' Zahi Hawass said.`` If anything happens, I will announce it.''
